issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding the Affordable Care Act, protecting pre-existing condition coverage, and reducing prescription drug costs

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Advocates for comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship for undocumented immigrants, and protection for DACA recipients

issues.title: Minimum Wage Increase
issues.description: Supports raising federal minimum wage to $15 per hour and indexing it to inflation

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Supports Green New Deal framework, aggressive carbon reduction targets, and investment in renewable energy infrastructure

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Advocates for increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded access to community college and vocational training
issues.source: Committee on Education and Labor statements

issues.title: Workers' Rights
issues.description: Supports strengthening labor unions, protecting collective bargaining rights, and improving workplace safety regulations

issues.title: Gun Violence Prevention
issues.description: Supports universal background checks, assault weapons ban, and increased funding for gun violence research
